full_text:

On Thu, Jun 10, 2010 at 2:26 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>
> Well said, Frank, well said, some of us do have personal proof, other must

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Thu, Jun 10, 2010 3:46 am
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Alert,
>
>
>    Easy to claim one is all modern and sophisticated, that all is known,
> there are no demons, gods,or angels. Easy to forget, modern man doesn't know
> squat! All your science, all your universities, all your "logic"--nothing!
> Y'all don't know anythin'!
>
>  Awhile back I had an experience where I was awakened in the middle of the
> night to what seemed to be some entity crawling up inside my body starting
> at my feet, accompanied by weird visions/hallucinations, unable to move.
> Easy to dismiss as dreams, maybe a bit of undigested beef-to quote scrooge,
> but none of my usual protection stuff worked, till I thought "Jesus!" The
> thing lifted it's head and took off. I'm still not a believer, but I'm not a
> total rejector either. There has been times when I needed "His" help, and
> was answered, plus, what I guess were angels, in open air "Frank, He heard
> you". I don't believe in the church crap, but God is out there!  Not only
> that, is been ":scientifically" -as close to -proven as possible-- that the
> Shoud of Turin is in fact waht it appears to be--Jesus! Same question, what
> the hell kind of evidence will you find acceptable?
>
>  Some here will still insist all is known, and they are in fact the most
> advanced being the universe has ever seen--they have a great deal to learn!
> I try to tolerate their arrogance, but my patience is gone for that stuff.
> When they get over their name calling, maybe they will be allowed to post.
>
>  Frank-S
>
> On Wed, Jun 9, 2010 at 9:31 AM, Buck <shgiruss@...> wrote:
>
>>
>>    Snowfire, if i was dead (passed on) and was able to by happenstance

>> commands his people to murder children and women in one town and in the next
>> town kill all but virgin girls (old testament).
>>
>> I would say that there is only consciousness, not confined to any man made

>>
>> with love,
>> Russ
